command.name: command

stderr.name: stderr
stderr.title: Standard error output from running the command

stdout.name: stdout
stdout.title: Standard output from running the command

command.title: // User on this system
command.desc: user @defaults("name uid gid") { // User ID uid int // User's Group ID gid int // User's Security Identifier (Windows) sid string // Name of the user name string // Home folder home string // Default shell configured shell string // Indicates if the user is enabled enabled bool // List of authorized keys authorizedkeys() authorizedkeys // List of SSH keys sshkeys() []privatekey // Group that user is a member of group() group } // Users configured on this system users { []user } // List of SSH Authorized Keys authorizedkeys { []authorizedkeys.entry(file, content) init(path string) path string file() file content(file) string } // SSH authorized keys entry authorizedkeys.entry @defaults("key") { line int type string key string label() string options() []string file file } // Group on this system group @defaults("name gid") { init(id string) // Group ID gid int // Group's Security Identifier (Windows) sid string // Name of this group name string // Users who are members of this group members() []user } // Groups configured on this system groups { []group } Results of running a command on the system

basename.name: basename
basename.title: Filename without path prefix of this file

dirname.name: dirname
dirname.title: Path to the folder containing this file

empty.name: empty
empty.title: // Ownership information about the user
empty.desc: user() user // Ownership information about the group group() group Denotes whether the path is empty

exists.name: exists
exists.title: Indicator if this file exists on the system

path.name: path
path.title: Location of the file on the system

size.name: size
size.title: Size of this file on disk

file.permissions.name: file.permissions

group_executable.name: group_executable
group_executable.title: Indicator if this file is executable by members of the group

group_readable.name: group_readable
group_readable.title: Indicator if this file is readable by members of the group

group_writeable.name: group_writeable
group_writeable.title: Indicator if this file is writeable by members of the group

isDirectory.name: isDirectory
isDirectory.title: Whether the file describes a directory

isFile.name: isFile
isFile.title: Whether the file describes a regular file

isSymlink.name: isSymlink
isSymlink.title: Whether the file is a symlink

mode.name: mode
mode.title: Raw POSIX mode for the permissions

other_executable.name: other_executable
other_executable.title: Indicator if this file is executable by others

other_readable.name: other_readable
other_readable.title: Indicator if this file is readable by others

other_writeable.name: other_writeable
other_writeable.title: Indicator if this file is writeable by others

string.name: string
string.title: A simple printed string version of the permissions

user_executable.name: user_executable
user_executable.title: Indicator if this file is executable by its owner

user_readable.name: user_readable
user_readable.title: Indicator if this file is readable by its owner

user_writeable.name: user_writeable
user_writeable.title: Indicator if this file is writeable by its owner

file.permissions.title: Access permissions for a given file
